nodes.text: Station TFP-9 was an ovoid-shaped space station owned by the Trade Federation. It was located in the sixth orbital position of the Naboo system, and was the outpost for the Federation in that system. It was the first installation to be attacked by Captain Sorran's pirate starfighter fleet during their attempt to steal several N-1 starfighters. During the battle with Echo Flight, Naboo pilot Dren Melne revealed that his loyalties were with Sorran's employer by shooting down a number of Echo Flight pilots in an attempt to force Essara Till to surrender.
